verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Go <WH935> in unto Pharaoh <WH6547>: for I have hardened <WH3513> his heart <WH3820>, and the heart <WH3820> of his servants <WH5650>, that I might shew <WH7896> these my signs <WH226> before <WH7130> him:

And that thou mayest tell <WH5608> in the ears <WH241> of thy son <WH1121>, and of thy son's <WH1121> son <WH1121>, what things I have wrought <WH5953> in Egypt <WH4714>, and my signs <WH226> which I have done <WH7760> among them; that ye may know <WH3045> how that I am the LORD <WH3068>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came in <WH935> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and said <WH559> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680>, How long <WH4970> wilt thou refuse <WH3985> to humble <WH6031> thyself before <WH6440> me? let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971>, that they may serve <WH5647> me.
Else <WH3588>, if thou refuse <WH3986> to let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971>, behold, to morrow <WH4279> will I bring <WH935> the locusts <WH697> into thy coast <WH1366>:

And they shall cover <WH3680> the face <WH5869> of the earth <WH776>, that one cannot be able <WH3201> to see <WH7200> the earth <WH776>: and they shall eat <WH398> the residue <WH3499> of that which is escaped <WH6413>, which remaineth <WH7604> unto you from the hail <WH1259>, and shall eat <WH398> every tree <WH6086> which groweth <WH6779> for you out of the field <WH7704>: face: Heb. eye

And they shall fill <WH4390> thy houses <WH1004>, and the houses <WH1004> of all thy servants <WH5650>, and the houses <WH1004> of all the Egyptians <WH4714>; which neither thy fathers <WH1>, nor thy fathers' <WH1> fathers <WH1> have seen <WH7200>, since the day <WH3117> that they were upon the earth <WH127> unto this day <WH3117>. And he turned <WH6437> himself, and went out <WH3318> from Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And Pharaoh's <WH6547> servants <WH5650> said <WH559> unto him, How long shall this man be a snare <WH4170> unto us? let the men <WH582> go <WH7971>, that they may serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430>: knowest <WH3045> thou not yet <WH2962> that Egypt <WH4714> is destroyed <WH6>?

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> were brought again <WH7725> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>: and he said <WH559> unto them, Go <WH3212>, serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>: but who are they that shall go <WH1980>? who: Heb. who and who, etc

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, We will go <WH3212> with our young <WH5288> and with our old <WH2205>, with our sons <WH1121> and with our daughters <WH1323>, with our flocks <WH6629> and with our herds <WH1241> will we go <WH3212>; for we must hold a feast <WH2282> unto the LORD <WH3068>.
And he said <WH559> unto them, Let the LORD <WH3068> be so with you, as I will let you go <WH7971>, and your little ones <WH2945>: look <WH7200> to it; for evil <WH7451> is before <WH6440> you.
Not so: go <WH3212> now ye that are men <WH1397>, and serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068>; for that ye did desire <WH1245>. And they were driven out <WH1644> from Pharaoh's <WH6547> presence <WH6440>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Stretch out <WH5186> thine hand <WH3027> over the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for the locusts <WH697>, that they may come up <WH5927> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and eat <WH398> every herb <WH6212> of the land <WH776>, even all that the hail <WH1259> hath left <WH7604>.

And Moses <WH4872> stretched forth <WH5186> his rod <WH4294> over the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH5090> an east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> upon the land <WH776> all that day <WH3117>, and all that night <WH3915>; and when it was morning <WH1242>, the east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> brought <WH5375> the locusts <WH697>.

And the locusts <WH697> went up <WH5927> over all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and rested <WH5117> in all the coasts <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714>: very <WH3966> grievous <WH3515> were they; before <WH6440> them there were no such <WH3651> locusts <WH697> as they, neither after <WH310> them shall be such.

For they covered <WH3680> the face <WH5869> of the whole earth <WH776>, so that the land <WH776> was darkened <WH2821>; and they did eat <WH398> every herb <WH6212> of the land <WH776>, and all the fruit <WH6529> of the trees <WH6086> which the hail <WH1259> had left <WH3498>: and there remained <WH3498> not any green thing <WH3418> in the trees <WH6086>, or in the herbs <WH6212> of the field <WH7704>, through all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in haste <WH4116>; and he said <WH559>, I have sinned <WH2398> against the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and against you. called: Heb. hastened to call

Now therefore forgive <WH5375>, I pray thee, my sin <WH2403> only this once <WH6471>, and intreat <WH6279> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, that he may take away <WH5493> from me this death <WH4194> only.
And he went out <WH3318> from Pharaoh <WH6547>, and intreated <WH6279> the LORD <WH3068>.

And the LORD <WH3068> turned <WH2015> a mighty <WH3966> strong <WH2389> west <WH3220> wind <WH7307>, which took away <WH5375> the locusts <WH697>, and cast <WH8628> them into the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>; there remained <WH7604> not one <WH259> locust <WH697> in all the coasts <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714>. cast: Heb. fastened
But the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, so that he would not let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> go <WH7971>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Stretch out <WH5186> thine hand <WH3027> toward heaven <WH8064>, that there may be darkness <WH2822> over the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, even darkness <WH2822> which may be felt <WH4959>. even: Heb. that one may feel darkness

And Moses <WH4872> stretched forth <WH5186> his hand <WH3027> toward heaven <WH8064>; and there was a thick <WH653> darkness <WH2822> in all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>:

They saw <WH7200> not one <WH376> another <WH251>, neither rose <WH6965> any <WH376> from his place for three <WH7969> days <WH3117>: but all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had light <WH216> in their dwellings <WH4186>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> unto Moses <WH4872>, and said <WH559>, Go <WH3212> ye, serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068>; only let your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241> be stayed <WH3322>: let your little ones <WH2945> also go <WH3212> with you.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Thou must give <WH5414> us <WH3027> also sacrifices <WH2077> and burnt offerings <WH5930>, that we may sacrifice <WH6213> unto the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>. us: Heb. into our hands

Our cattle <WH4735> also shall go <WH3212> with us; there shall not an hoof <WH6541> be left behind <WH7604>; for thereof must we take <WH3947> to serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>; and we know <WH3045> not with what we must serve <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068>, until we come <WH935> thither.
But the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, and he would <WH14> not let them go <WH7971>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> unto him, Get <WH3212> thee from me, take heed <WH8104> to thyself, see <WH7200> my face <WH6440> no more <WH3254>; for in that day <WH3117> thou seest <WH7200> my face <WH6440> thou shalt die <WH4191>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Thou hast spoken <WH1696> well <WH3651>, I will see <WH7200> thy face <WH6440> again <WH3254> no more.
